item.title: Trolleys full of rubbish, 28th October
item.description:
This area on Bugsby’s Way is disgusting. It’s very high traffic and constantly full of rubbish, in the last 6 months or so there is always 1 or more trolleys full of rubbish there. I regularly see rats there, why council can’t send someone regularly to clean this mess up and instead all rubbish is left their for weeks and even months, just accumulating and piling up?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bugsby's Way, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree interfering with cables, 28th October
item.description:
Overgrown tree outside of my home is interfering with telegraph pole and cables. Please see photographs. Large cable is now hanging down from pole abd large tree branches are interfering with pole substantially. Pavement/ tarmac repair work is also lifting. Tree needs substantial cutting back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Elmers End Road, Upper Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose drain cover, 28th October
item.description:
The drain/manhole cover in the road is loose and clatters every time a car goes over it. It’s getting g worse and is disturbing our day to day living including sleep. It has been like this for several weeks and needs to be secured before it finally cracks and causes a serious accident.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Petts Wood Road, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approx 40 Cylinders of Fastgas Nitrous Oxide, 28th October
item.description:
Approx 40 Cylinders of Fastgas Nitrous Oxide stacked against rear of flats. The cylinders were in cardboard boxes and the combination presents a combustible and explosive hazard, please remove. Noticed by LFB in passing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 167-177, Stonhouse Street, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
